name: WIZARD_STAFF
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Literacy: Common, Literacy: Celestial, Literacy: Draconic, Literacy: Infernal.

name: BOW_AND_ARROWS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Aimed Shot, Multi Shot, Quick Shot, Dark Vision.

name: THROWING_KNIVES
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Blade Flurry, Deadly Throw, Silent Move, Dual Wield.

name: SWORD_AND_BUCKLER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Heroic Charge, Crushing Blow, Sweeping Blow, Shield Bash.

name: LEATHER_ARMOUR_SET
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing any monster. Note that monsters are visibly larger than your average creature.

name: POTION_OF_ANTIDOTE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 7.

name: POTION_OF_HEALING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 14.

name: COMMON_LITERACY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the secret seventh talent.

name: THE_INTERFACE_DOG
description: This heritage can be unlocked by viewing all tutorial entries.

name: THE_SILVER_SPOON
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 11 enchanted items equipped at the same time.

name: ONE_STRANGE_TRIP
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while eating only blood cap mushrooms.

name: THE_PANDAMONIUM
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while causing physical damage with fists only.

name: ARCANE_GIMMICKRY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by finding three or more hidden magic traps with the search button in a single game.

name: LIGHTNING_REFLEXES
description: This heritage can be unlocked by passing three or more reflex checks in a single game.

name: HEROES_OF_HALLWOOD
description: This heritage can be unlocked by visiting the graves of all Heroes of Hallwood.

name: FIRE_RESISTANT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of fire resistance at any given time.

name: FROST_RESISTANT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of frost resistance at any given time.

name: SHOCK_RESISTANT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of shock resistance at any given time.

name: POISON_RESISTANT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 15 or more points of poison resistance at any given time.

name: DISEASE_RESISTANT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having 15 or more points of disease resistance at any given time.

name: BLISSFUL_IGNORANCE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning six talents without learning how to read.

name: CELESTIAL_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Celestial spells in a single game.

name: DRACONIC_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Draconic spells in a single game.

name: INFERNAL_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Infernal spells in a single game.

name: AMULET_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all amulet effects in a single game.

name: RING_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all ring effects in a single game.

name: WAND_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all wand effects in a single game.

name: SCROLL_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all scroll effects in a single game.

name: POTION_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all potion effects in a single game.

name: ENCHANT_KNOWLEDGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all enchant effects in a single game.

name: DEFILE_THIS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a black shirt or robe and defiling graves until you see something purple.

name: HEALTHY_DIET
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a red shirt or robe and eating some meat.

name: MIGHTY_HULK
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a green shirt or robe and destroying an item by throwing it to a wall.

name: LOOSE_WEIGHT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a blue shirt or robe and dropping an item while stuck in a water pit.

name: THE_WANDERER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing an orange shirt or robe and wielding two swords at the same time.

name: THREE_TAILS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a yellow shirt or robe and flipping a coin until you get three tails in a row.

name: THE_PINK_ORDER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a pink shirt or robe and saying "I love pink" without the quotes on the chat.

name: BIG_BADA_BOOM
description: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a white shirt or robe and using a soul gem until you receive your multipass.

name: OVER_9000
description: This heritage can be unlocked by obtaining a score of over 9000 after unlocking all eight shirt heritages.

name: GURMURS_END
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Gurmur and interrupting the cultists' plan to take over the world.

name: CANIS_WOOFUS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a Dread Wolf.

name: FAMILIARIPATHY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by taking a look at Woof while it is badly hurt or almost dead.

name: TRAPS_ARE_BAD
description: This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Woof from a pit.

name: HARDENED_SKIN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 3.

name: WINTER_FUR_COAT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 6.

name: ARCTIC_FUR_COAT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 9.

name: FEROCIOUS_BITE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 12.

name: SHARPENED_FANGS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 15.

name: RARE_BREED
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a Dire Wolf.

name: EPIC_BREED
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a monster.

name: BOTTLED_RAGE
description: This challenge can be completed by killing an enemy with a healing potion.

name: ONE_STRAY_SHOT
description: This challenge can be completed by causing 25 or more damage to an enemy with a single shot.

name: THE_CURVE_BALL
description: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured level 10+ enemy with a single hit from a thrown weapon. Instant kill effects do not count.

name: ITCH_BE_SLAPPED
description: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster while causing damage only with your bare hands.

name: THE_GHOSTBUSTER
description: This challenge can be completed by killing all Heroes of Hallwood in the final battle.

name: AGAINST_THE_ODDS
description: This challenge can be completed by clearing an entire dungeon while having a cursed amulet and two cursed rings equipped. Items must be equipped at the time the dungeon is reset and closing an entrance does not count.

name: DARK_PASSENGER
description: This challenge can be completed by reaching level 20 without lighting any torches.

name: THE_LOOSE_KNOT
description: This challenge can be completed by killing yourself using telekinesis.

name: TRUE_DEVOTION
description: This challenge can be completed by completing all other challenges.

name: CONTROL_FREAK
description: This challenge can be completed by enslaving a daemon while having a human, undead, beast and monster friends at the same.

name: METICULOUS_ONE
description: This challenge can be completed by finishing all nine special encounters in a single game.

name: FEEL_THE_POWER
description: This challenge can be completed by having 48 or more ability points without buffs or debuffs.

name: PEACEFUL_HIPPIE
description: This challenge can be completed by reaching level 10 without killing anyone or anything.

name: THE_BUBBLE_BOY
description: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after casting Divine Shield while having only one health remaining.

name: THE_PRODIGAL_SON
description: This challenge can be completed by having six unused talent points.

name: MERCHANTS_TALE
description: This challenge can be completed by having 2450 gold coins in your backpack.

name: BIGGER_THEY_ARE
description: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster with a single blow. Instant kill effects do not count.

name: THATS_CHEATING
description: This challenge can be completed by looting the crown after dying at least once.

name: THE_EPIC_SPLAT
description: This challenge can be completed by failing a reflex check while having Lightning Reflexes heritage and Sixth Sense talent.

name: ONE_NASTY_FLU
description: This challenge can be completed by having 20 ability damage effects that reduce all abilities by 5.

name: JUST_A_SCRATCH
description: This challenge can be completed by killing a creature that has hit you for 25 or more points of damage with a single attack or spell.

name: IDLE_BOOKWORM
description: This challenge can be completed by learning all Celestial, Draconic and Infernal spells in a single game.

name: BAD_ROMANCE
description: This challenge can be completed by showing your inner rogue and killing your puppy eyed soul mate.

name: UNDEAD_PARTY
description: This challenge can be completed by starting the final battle with 8 or more undead friends.

name: THE_RED_MIST
description: This challenge can be completed by killing five or more enemies with a single melee attack.

name: POISON_BLADE
description: This challenge can be completed by equipping a weapon that has ten or more poison effects.

name: FROSTY_TOUCH
description: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured drake with frozen orbs. Instant kill effects do not count.

name: MY_PRECIOUS
description: This challenge can be completed by obtaining the ring of power.

name: DARK_SHROUD
description: This challenge can be completed by having ten or more curse effects at the same time.

name: FULLY_BUFFED
description: This challenge can be completed by having twelve or more buff effects at the same time.

name: CRAFTALICIOUS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Artificer Leo Noerde and bringing him back to town.

name: SWORDS_N_STUFF
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Talon, Fine Sword, Fine Claw.

name: JUST_SMASHING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Flail, Fine Mace, Fine Hammer.

name: HEAVY_HITTERS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Mangler, Fine Chopper, Fine Crusher.

name: FLYING_TITHRIL
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Hatchet, Fine Throwing Knife, Fine Throwing Star.

name: COMPLEX_TENSION
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Recurve, Fine Crossbow, Fine Repeater.

name: SOLID_PROTECTION
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Target, Fine Shield, Fine Barrier.

name: HARDENED_SKULL
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Helm, Fine Studded Helm, Fine Chain Helm, Fine Plate Helm.

name: SMART_CLOTHING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Armour, Fine Studded Armour, Fine Chain Armour, Fine Plate Armour.

name: PATRON_OF_ARTS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by donating four or more unique items to the Artisans' Guild in a single game.

name: SPIRITUAL_GUIDANCE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Shapeshift: Wolf, Shapeshift: Bear, Bestial Wrath.

name: BESTIAL_VIGOUR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by regaining over 666 points of health while shapeshifted and in combat.

name: LEADER_OF_THE_PACK
description: This heritage can be unlocked by shapeshifting while having 6 or more beast friends.

name: THATS_GRIZZLY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having a strength modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a bear.

name: URSUS_HORRIBILIS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a single hit in bear form at level 20.

name: BLOOD_FRENZY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by critically hitting any of the named encounter bosses in bear form.

name: LUPINE_GRACE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having an agility modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a wolf.

name: VAMPIRIC_BITE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by eating a dread bat that has leeched life from you while you are in wolf form.

name: FACE_MUNCHER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a critical hit in wolf form at level 20.

name: MONSTER_CHOW
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing 3 monsters and eating their corpses while shapeshifted.

name: ACNE_TREATMENT
description: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after spending 5 or more turns in lava.

name: FEELING_SLIMY
description: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after being surrounded by 8 dwellers and/or lurkers.

name: TAX_EVASION
description: This challenge can be completed by killing 21 enemies in a row without being hit by a melee, ranged or spell attack.

name: BLOOD_SUCKER
description: This challenge can be completed by regaining 42 points of health by life draining enemies.

name: EL_PRESIDENTE
description: This challenge can be completed by doing the following: store 10000 or more gold coins, spend it all until you have 0 gold, drop all items from your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold, store 10000 or more gold coins and type "Everything in life is luck".

name: MAIN_COURSE
description: This challenge can be completed by by eating the following monsters while polymorphed: Cave Bear, Drake, Floater, Glutopod, Infernal and Mamalob.

name: ROAD_TO_HELL
description: This challenge can be completed by killing 66 under aged daemons at level 20 after typing: "I offer my dungeon to you".

name: HOWDY_HO
description: This challenge can be completed by finding and resurrecting Ken'nih before his corpse is eaten by rats.

name: DOG_WHISPERER
description: This challenge can be completed by having Woof cause any damage to the King.

name: I_GOT_THIS
description: This challenge can be completed by looting the crown on heroic difficulty level.

name: NABONS_DEMISE
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Dread Lord Nabon and ending his reign of terror.

name: DWARFAGEDDON
description: This challenge can be completed by making sure that dwarves won't be added in the game anytime soon.

name: MENTAL_DISORDER
description: This challenge can be completed by befriending an infernal.

name: MOTHER_OF_DRAKES
description: This challenge can be completed by having three permanent drake friends at the same time.

name: ITS_ELEMENTARY
description: This challenge can be completed by causing at least 25 points of enchanted elemental damage before resistances with a single melee or ranged hit.

name: SAFETY_CONSCIOUS
description: This challenge can be completed by viewing your stats while having 22 immunities (press Ctrl in the inventory).

name: WHOS_TROLLING
description: This challenge can be completed by completing the following steps: Reach level 18 or higher, find a Third Leg of the Imp, type "I'm over 9 inches", slay enough trolls.

name: GREENHOUSE_EFFECT
description: This challenge can be completed by having a treeman heal four or more other treemen in one turn.

name: RAT_LIVES_MATTER
description: This challenge can be completed by killing a merchant and all his henchmen with giant rats.

name: TRIGGERED_MUCH
description: This challenge can be completed by slaying a demonrat that is properly triggered.

name: DRAIN_THE_SWAMP
description: This challenge can be completed by naming a weapon "Orangutang" and using it to slay 50 swamp monsters.

name: CHEESY_MUSK
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: DEATH_PROOF
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: FLASHLIGHT
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: HATEFUL_AURA
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: LEAP_OF_FAITH
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: MISINVISICAST
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: NIGHTSHADE
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: ORBUS_BOMBA
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: ZOMBIE_DOG
description: This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.

name: ARCANE_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Arcane spells in a single game.

name: BESTIAL_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Bestial spells in a single game.

name: ABYSSAL_MASTERY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Abyssal spells in a single game.

name: CRY_ON_MY_SHOULDER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Spaulders, Fine Studded Spaulders, Fine Chain Spaulders, Fine Plate Spaulders.

name: BRACE_FOR_IMPACT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Vambraces, Fine Studded Vambraces, Fine Chain Vambraces, Fine Plate Vambraces.

name: HAIRY_HANDGUARDS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Gloves, Fine Studded Gloves, Fine Chain Gloves, Fine Plate Gauntlets.

name: DONT_TREAD_ON_ME
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Boots, Fine Studded Boots, Fine Chain Boots, Fine Plate Sabatons.

name: SECOND_AMENDMENT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by donating an item from the future to the Artisan's Guild.

name: RISE_OF_FAIRIES
description: This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified horn to the Artisan's Guild.

name: WESTER_WORSHIPPER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified pyramidion to the Artisan's Guild.

name: PATH_OF_WISDOM
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Wise' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_JUSTICE
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Just' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_DECENCY
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Decent' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_KINDNESS
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Kind' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_CRUELTY
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Cruel' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_FAIRNESS
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Fair' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: PATH_OF_COMPASSION
description: This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Gentle' after finishing the test of leadership.

name: INDIVISIBLE_GREED
description: This challenge can be completed by reseting a dungeon after meeting three angry pops.

name: BALTHARS_DAY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Balthar the Familiar.

name: THE_SHROOM_BAWL
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer.

name: SKALDIRS_FATE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Skaldir the Timeless.

name: SPAULDER_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of spaulders in one of your stash boxes.

name: VAMBRACE_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of vambraces in one of your stash boxes.

name: GLOVE_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of gloves in one of your stash boxes.

name: BOOT_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of boots in one of your stash boxes.

name: AMULET_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of amulets in one of your stash boxes.

name: RING_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of rings in one of your stash boxes.

name: CHARM_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of charms in one of your stash boxes.

name: RUNE_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of runes in one of your stash boxes.

name: BURNING_ANXIETY
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Balthar the Familiar while wearing Ring of Anxiety.

name: CIRCULAR_STRIKE
description: This challenge can be completed by finding out the exploitable weakness of Ch'Ri the Blingstealer.

name: CHAMP_OF_CHAMPS
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer without haste effects or exploits and without being poisoned.

name: SANDS_OF_TIME
description: This challenge can be completed by finding out the exploitable weakness of Skaldir the Timeless.

name: SKULLS_AND_BONES
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Skaldir the Timeless without haste effects or exploits.

name: BONEY_TWIN_JOB
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Skaldir the Timeless twice in a single game.

name: JUNK_COLLECTOR
description: This challenge can be completed by completing all collector heritages in any number of games.

name: FITTING_JUST_US
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Boarstone with the gift crossbow and Slow and Steady talent.

name: BLOODY_CLUB
description: This legendary effect can be imbued by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer (only works with a club or fine club).

name: THE_SEAL_CLUB
description: This challenge can be completed by killing the King with a Bloody Club.

name: BINDING_RITUAL
description: This challenge can be completed by performing a binding ritual described in the grimoire.

name: AURELIUS_FEVER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by doing the following: Contract a dungeon fever from a bear trap, spike trap or spiked pit. Visit Shrine of Fubar and donate 100 gold coins or more to remove all illnesses.

name: DINGBATS_DOOM
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a dingbat that goes by the name Bierkoff.

name: PLAGUE_RESERVE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing 42 or more bats in dingbat form (bat swarms count as 9).

name: EXPANDED_MIND
description: This heritage can be unlocked by eating a floater in dingbat form.

name: SPIKE_PROTEINS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing an earth elemental in dingbat form.

name: TRANSBAT_CUTIE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having a charisma modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a dingbat.

name: DRINKING_PROBLEM
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Gurmur before reaching level 20 but after gaining 6 levels by drinking Cowrain Extra.

name: BATMAN_ROYALE
description: This challenge can be unlocked by doing the following: Shapeshift into dingbat form before or during the undead phase in the final battle. Do not shapeshift back into human form before the crown has dropped on the floor.

name: HAIL_THE_POOCH
description: This heritage can be unlocked by ordering Woof 88 times while hidden and using Sign Language talent.

name: TRAGICAL_GATHERING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by defeating the training dummy at the Outcast's Refuge.

name: BOOSTER_PACK_I
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 10 in the Tragical Gathering game.

name: BOOSTER_PACK_II
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 20 in the Tragical Gathering game.

name: BOOSTER_PACK_III
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 30 in the Tragical Gathering game.

name: BOOSTER_PACK_IV
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 40 in the Tragical Gathering game.

name: BOOSTER_PACK_V
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 50 in the Tragical Gathering game.

name: PREMADE_DECK
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 25 using a premade deck.

name: FOILED_PRECIOUS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by playing a certain legendary card.

name: BEBE_LE_FROG
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Bebe le Frog and some Hooklers that hang around her.

name: CARD_COLLECTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by collecting the first 250 cards in your tragical album.

name: TCG_CARD_4
description: This achievement can be unlocked by adding card number 4 in your card album.

name: TCG_CARD_5
description: This achievement can be unlocked by adding card number 5 in your card album.

name: JUST_ANOTHER_ROCK
description: This challenge can be completed by killing Calfaxx the Undefeated.

name: SOULHUNTERS_BAG
description: This heritage can be unlocked by purchasing the Soulhunter's Bag from the curio vendor.

name: SCRAP_POUCH
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for Scrap Pouch in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: BOOMERAX
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for Boomerax in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: GHOULBANE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for Ghoulbane in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: GAWDHAMMER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for G'awdmer in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: BLOODLETTER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for Bloodletter in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: WOLFSBANE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by transmuting Recipe for Wolfsbane in the Soulhunter's Bag.

name: ELEMENTAL_ARROWS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting all of the arrows listed below in a single game: Flaming Arrow, Freezing Arrow, Shocking Arrow, Knockout Arrow.

name: ELEMENTAL_BOLTS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting all of the bolts listed below in a single game: Flaming Bolt, Freezing Bolt, Shocking Bolt, Knockout Bolt.

name: BADAKATHS_END
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Badakath and interrupting the vermen plan to destroy the world.

name: INFERNAL_BLOODLINE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by scooping some infernal blood in the blood grail.

name: PERK_BACKBONE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_BLOODBORN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_FALLBACK
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_REVENGE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_SERVITUDE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_SOULBURN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_WHIRLWIND
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: DEMONRAT_BLOODLINE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by scooping some demonrat blood in the blood grail.

name: PERK_ADRENALIN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_ATHLETICS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_CHEESED
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_OPENING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_RAT_FORM
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_RIPOSTE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_SHADOWSTEP
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming infernal blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: SCAVENGER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by learning Shapeshift: Demonrat talent.

name: VERMIN_LORD
description: This heritage can be unlocked by killing 42 or more rats in demonrat form (rat swarms count as 9).

name: SUFFERING
description: This heritage can be unlocked by having the hateful aura effect when you transform into a demonrat.

name: SIR_FLETCH_A_LOT
description: This challenge can be completed by crafting a stack of legendary bolts.

name: I_DEMAND_SERVICE
description: This challenge can be completed by identifying a blood scrip at the Diviners' Guild.

name: DEMONIC_PRESENCE
description: This challenge can be completed by unlocking all infernal and demonrat bloodline perks.

name: HERO_OF_THE_DAY
description: This challenge can be completed by stopping Peargele's plan to take over the world.

name: DRACONIC_BLOODLINE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by scooping some draconic blood in the blood grail.

name: PERK_ANATOMY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_BUFFERED
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_CONDUCTOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_OLD_TIMER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_SOFTBELLY
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_SPINAL_TAP
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_WILDFIRE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming draconic blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: TROLLISH_BLOODLINE
description: This heritage can be unlocked by scooping some troll blood in the blood grail.

name: PERK_BOULDERSIGHT
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_CRUUUUUUSH
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_GREENSKIN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_LIVING_FLESH
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_REGENERATION
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_ROCK_LOBBER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: PERK_THICK_SKULL
description: This heritage can be unlocked by consuming troll blood that is infused with a blood scrip.

name: RUNE_GRINDER
description: This heritage can be unlocked after learning a few Orcish words.

name: RUNE_SCHEMATICS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by storing all 30 basic runes in Leo's Workshop.

name: PUREBLOODED
description: This heritage can be completed by drinking a vial of pureblood.

name: SOUS_SHI_CHEF
description: This heritage can be completed by eating at least 10 different fish while under the influence of alcohol.

name: MOST_ILLOGICAL
description: This challenge can be completed by solving the puzzle quest three times in a single game.

name: BLESSED_TWINS
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting a legendary amulet after completing a short quest line.

name: MEANS_TO_AN_END
description: This challenge can be completed by choosing the violent path to obtain a dreamweave thread.

name: YOUNG_ADVENTURER
description: This heritage can be unlocked by speaking to a priestess at the shrine of young adventurers.

name: CLOSE_ENCOUNTER
description: This challenge can be completed by being rolled over after behaving like a true doughhead.

name: WINTER_WARRIOR
description: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting all of the items listed below in a single game: Winter Helm, Winter Armour, Winter Spaulders, Winter Vambraces, Winter Gloves and Winter Boots.

name: THERMAL_TATTOO
description: This heritage can be unlocked by reading an incantation written on five zombie skin vellums.

name: ZOMBIE_GARDEN
description: This heritage can be unlocked by clearing out all zombies at the frozen cemetery.

name: FROZEN_OAKNUT
description: This challenge can be completed by reaching level 9 hypothermia while carrying an acorn.
